item.title: These hot S&P 500 stocks show where investors are heading as they run away from tech
item.description: The industrials sector has been a big beneficiary of the rotation out of tech, with a number of defense and transportation stocks hitting new highs on...

item.title: Qualcomm’s stock falls as memory constraints hit outlook
item.description: Tech companies across the board are feeling the sting of memory-chip shortages, and Qualcomm just showed it’s no exception.

item.title: Software ate the world. Now, Wall Street is worried AI will eat software.
item.description: Investors have quickly moved to sell shares of companies that looked like they could be on the menu

item.title: Soybean prices surge to highest level this year, as Trump surprises market with plan for more sales to China
item.description: The sort of buying President Trump outlined from China seems “unlikely on many fronts, but neither can the possibility be ignored,” analyst says.
